GS39purukadu:2: * idānīm ātmabhuvā kriyamāṇe saptatantau tatsādhanatvenānirvacanīyasukhodbodhahetutvena vāruṇīprāśanam anudarśayati ananyajasaptatantāv iti
GS39purukadu:3: * anutṛṣyanti anirvacanīyānandaṃ prāpnuvanti anenety anutarṣaṃ kādambaraṃ tasya svīkaraṇam
GS39purukadu:4: anuprāśanaṃ tasya prāśanasyātyāvaśyakatvam atīva īpsitatamatvam anirvacanīyānandapradātṛtvena
GS39purukadu:5: retaḥstambhakatvena hetunā karmānuṣṭhānāt pūrvaṃ pracetasaḥ kanyāyāḥ svīkaraṇaṃ kartavyam ity arthaḥ // 1.2
GS39purukadu:8: * nanu anutarṣasvīkaraṇam adṛṣṭaphalodbodhe upakārakam āho svit dṛṣṭaphalodbodhe
GS39purukadu:9: upakārakaṃ veti saṃśayavākyam upanyasya dṛṣṭaphalodbodhe eva sākṣād upakārakaṃ na
GS39purukadu:10: kiṃcit svargādiphalavat ānuśravikavākyaṃ kalpyam upakārakam iti manasi niścitya pūrvasūtrasya
GS39purukadu:15: * anena vākyena anayoḥ kāryakāraṇasaṃgatiḥ upapāditā bhavati tathā cāyam arthaḥ anutarṣasvīkaraṇe
GS39purukadu:16: kṛte sati nidhuvanavyāpāre ratyānando 'nirvacanīya utpadyate netarathā sāmudrikaṇāmiśritasya
GS39purukadu:17: sūpaśākādidravyasyeva nīrasaḥ svāduḥ prādurbhūyate ity arthaḥ // 2.3
GS39purukadu:18: * anyad apy anirvacanīyam upakārāntaraṃ tṛtīyasūtreṇa anuśāsti saṃpradarśayati // 2.4]
GS39purukadu:21: * pāśinaḥ ātmajāyayā saha atiprītyupacayena tādātmyabhāvaṃ gamite sati nimittakāraṇasyātyupakārakatayā
GS39purukadu:23: * anena vākyenātyāvaśyakatayā tādṛgvyāpārasya purastāt tādṛṅnirveśanaṃ sampādya tatpurastāt
GS39purukadu:24: saptatantoḥ karmādhikāre 'dhikāritā itarathā nimittakāraṇe utsāhaśaktibhraṃśāt sākalyena
GS39purukadu:29: * prayojyasyodañjeḥ prādhānyakartṛtvam abhyutthāne sati sampadyate tadabhāve abhyutthānābhāve nimittāpāye naimittikasyāpy apāya iti nyāyena ratitantraṃ lupyate kutaḥ // 4.2
GS39purukadu:30: * nimittakāraṇasyābhāvāt yathā turīvemādisattve paṭakāryasyotpattir netarathā tathā abhyutthānasattve tantravidhānasyotpattiḥ // 4.3
GS39purukadu:31: * anena vākyenātyāvaśyakatvenānutarṣasvīkaraṇaṃ sampādya tatpurastāt nidhuvanavyāpāre pravṛttir vidheyā iti bhāvaḥ // 4.4
GS39purukadu:32: * idānīṃ sūtracatuṣṭayasya sākalyena kṛtsnaṃ tātparyārthaṃ saṃgṛhya avyabhicaritaṃ sarvasūtrāṇāṃ rāddhāntavākyaṃ saṃpradarśayati // 4.5]
GS39purukadu:33: prayojye narmavyāpāravistāre abhyutthānaviśiṣṭodañjyabhāve sarvāṅgīṇavyāpāropalakṣitaṃ ratitantraṃ kartum adhikārābhāvāt // 5 * [
GS39purukadu:35: * pūrvasmin sūtre vāhyatantre yat kiṃcid avacchedenādhikārikatvaṃ nirūpitam asmin
GS39purukadu:36: sūtre tu prayojakasya sākalyena narmapravṛttinimittasyābhāve jāyamāne sati prayojyavyāpāre
GS39purukadu:37: 'pi atyantābhāvasya vidhānaṃ nirvyavasāyenaiva prāptaṃ bhavati kiṃcid viśeṣavidhānaṃ
GS39purukadu:39: * tasmād anutarṣasvīkaraṇād anantaram eva narmakarmādhikāre ādhikārikatvam iti pañcasūtrāṇām eka eva tātparyārthaḥ // 5.3
GS39purukadu:40: * māghakirātaraghuvaṃśeṣu siddhāntitasya vākyasyaivāyam anuvādaḥ na tv apūrvavidhānaṃ svamanīṣayā upakalpya proktam iti śaṅkanīyam // 5.4
GS39purukadu:41: * kiṃ ca dvitīyāvasthām atikrāntasya diṣṭyātmajāyayā saha asaṃstutapremaprāduṣkaraṇe
GS39purukadu:42: saṃyuktasya janasya saprakārakarasotpattyanubhave tādṛṅmanīṣāyā abhāvāt sīdhusaṃgrahaṇaṃ
GS39purukadu:43: paramakāraṇatvena nābhimatam taditarāvasthāyāṃ tu andhasaḥ śamalasya anirvacanīyānandaprakāśane
GS39purukadu:44: svīkaraṇatvena saṃgrahaṇam atyāvaśyakatvenābhimatam eva īdṛksaṃvidā yāthārthyajñānaṃ
GS39purukadu:45: parikalpya tādṛkkarmādhikāre anutarṣasvīkaraṇam atyāvaśyakatamam iti narmavyāpārakartṇām
GS39purukadu:50: yo rasaḥ amṛtāndhasām upabhogayogya iti yāvat kādambararasasya anuprāśanasya paramakāraṇatvam
GS39purukadu:51: tādṛgrase sampīte sati nidhuvanavyāpāravistāre rasabhāvanāviśeṣacaturāṇām anirvacanīyasukhodbodhaṃ
GS39purukadu:53: * kiṃ cānyad apy anirvacanīyaṃ rasaviśeṣāntaraṃ sīdhuprāśanenānudarśayati // 6.3]
GS39purukadu:57: * puṣkarādhipateḥ ātmajāyāḥ lalitavibhramabandhaprāduṣkaraṇaṃ naisargikaḥ svabhāva iti sūtrārthaḥ // 7.3
GS39purukadu:58: * atra puṣkarādhipatiśabdena pratīcyāḥ kāṣṭhāyāḥ adhipatir lakṣyate tasya ātmajāyāḥ
GS39purukadu:59: vāruṇyā anuprāśane kriyamāṇe lalitavibhramabandhānāṃ prakaṭīkaraṇe prayojikā bhavati
GS39purukadu:61: rucikaraprabandhāḥ atalapradeśāt kamalaniḥsaraṇam iva prāśanakartur mukhapadmanīḍāt
GS39purukadu:63: * idam eva rasaviśeṣāntaraṃ saṃnipatyopakārakanyāyena paramāpūrvasādhane prayojakībhūtaṃ
GS39purukadu:64: kāraṇaṃ nirbandhavarṇānāṃ śravaṇamātreṇa taddvārā manasijodbodhe anirvacanīyasādhanatvena
GS39purukadu:65: paramakāraṇatvam ayam eva tasyāḥ naisargikasvabhāva iti // 7.5
GS39purukadu:69: * śyāmāvasthāyā upa samīpe vartate sā upaśyāmā tayā caturdaśapañcadaśahāyanātmikayā
GS39purukadu:70: yoṣayā saha madhuvārā madhupānāvṛttiḥ udañjidhārṣṭye atyantadṛḍhataratve prayojako
GS39purukadu:71: bhavati anena vākyena parisaṃkhyāvidheḥ svarūpaṃ prakāśitaṃ bhavati // 8.2
GS39purukadu:72: * tathā cāyam arthaḥ atikrāntāvasthayā saha madhuvāre jāyamāne udañjidhārṣṭyaṃ naivotpadyate
GS39purukadu:73: tayā saha tādṛgvyavasāyaḥ vaiyarthyatāṃ pratipadyate nyubjaghaṭopari jalapūraṇanyāyena
GS39purukadu:74: tasmāt ratitantravilāse udañjidhārṣṭye manīṣāvatā puruṣeṇa galitayauvanayā saha madhuvāro
GS39purukadu:76: * nirarthakaprayāse kasyāpi matir naivotpadyata iti nyāyāt // 8.4
GS39purukadu:77: * dhanvantaryādīnāṃ matam anusṛtya kāpiśāyanasvīkaraṇe 'nirvacanīyāhlādadyotakam upakārāntaram anudarśayati // 8.5]
GS39purukadu:80: * ṣoḍaśavārṣikī śyāmeti vātsyāyanasūtre prasiddhiḥ tādṛgavasthayā yoṣayā saha niveśanaṃ
GS39purukadu:81: pānaṃ patiṣu nirviviśur madam aṅganā ity atra nirveśanaśabde pānaṃ lakṣyate yāmapramāṇaṃ
GS39purukadu:82: yāmadvayasaṃ pramāṇe dvayasaj iti sūtreṇa pramāṇārthe dvayasacpratyayaḥ tādṛkpramāṇopalakṣite
GS39purukadu:83: diṣṭe kāle kālo diṣṭopyanehāpīti kośasmaraṇāt tāvat kālam abhivyāpyeti yāvat retaḥstambhane
GS39purukadu:84: paramakāraṇam iti tayā saha kāpiśāyanasya svīkaraṇe kriyamāṇe ekayāmaparyantaṃ varāṅgopari
GS39purukadu:86: * idānīṃ narmavyāpāravistāre 'paricitanarmasukhānandāya nidhuvanāt pūrvaṃ kāpiśāyanaprāśanaṃ narmakhedāpanuttaye 'tyāvaśyakatvenānudarśayati
GS39purukadu:89: * nirgataṃ tanūruhaṃ yasmāt tat nistanūruhaṃ tanūruhāṇāṃ prādurbhāveṇa rahitaṃ tac
GS39purukadu:90: ca tat varāṅgaṃ ca tasya sambhedanaṃ svakīyenodañjinā mukhavidāraṇaṃ tādṛkkarmaṇi
GS39purukadu:91: kriyamāṇe ajñātanarmavyāpārāyai reyaprāśanaṃ kārayitavyam kṛte aireyaprāśane manasijasadmavidīrṇavyathā
GS39purukadu:92: sambhedakāle nānubhūyate itarathā sadmavidīrṇajanyavyathayā sadmani sthitānāṃ nāḍīnāṃ
GS39purukadu:93: viparyāsena vyānavāyau saṃkaṭavyathā atitarām anubhūyate tadvyathānivāraṇārthaṃ nidhuvanāt
GS39purukadu:94: pūrvaṃ dvipalapramāṇaṃ kāpiśāyanaṃ pāyayitavyam ity arthaḥ // 10.2
GS39purukadu:95: * tayā yoṣayā kāpiśāyane pīte sati uttarasūtreṇa pānajanyaṃ yat sukhaṃ tad darśayati // 10.3]
GS39purukadu:98: * priyasakhīdvārā kriyamāṇe 'nuprāśane satīti jñeyam madāvirbhāveṇa anusaṃdhānābhāvāt nirbhedajanyā vyathā nānubhūyate ity arthaḥ // 11.2
GS39purukadu:100: uttarasmin ghasre asaṃbheditam iva varāṅgaṃ paridṛśyate // 12 * [
GS39purukadu:102: * varāṅgavidīrṇād anantaram uttarasmin ghasre dine asaṃbheditam iva avidīrṇam iva paridṛśyate varāṅgam idam eva upakārakāntaram // 12.2
GS39purukadu:103: * yoṣāyā anuprāśanena taddvārā uttararūpe phalavaiśiṣṭyaṃ saṃpradarśayati // 12.3]
GS39purukadu:104: kriyamāṇe narmavyāpāre udañjer dhārṣṭyasya phalegrahiḥ paridṛśyate // 13 * [
GS39purukadu:106: * uttararūpeṇa kriyamāṇe narmavyāpāre nidhuvanavyāpāre udañjer dhārṣṭyasya yaṣṭikāṇḍam iva atikaṭhinatāṃ samprāptasya meḍhrasya phalegrahir avandhyasāmarthyaṃ paridṛśyate // 13.2
GS39purukadu:107: * etad uktaṃ bhavati kāpiśāyanasya anuprāśanamātreṇātisaṃkucitatvaṃ prāptasya yoṣāyāḥ
GS39purukadu:108: varāṅgasya atidṛḍhatamasyāpy udañjeḥ varāṅgamukhavidīrṇane sāmarthyābhāvāt parābhavaṃ
GS39purukadu:110: * saṃbhedite 'pi varāṅge kāpiśāyanaprāśanena atisaṃkocaṃ prāptasya yoṣāyāḥ varāṅgasya vivarakaraṇe udañjau mahatī vyathā prādurbhūyate iti bhāvaḥ
GS39purukadu:111: * anena vākyena dvitīyavṛttāv api punaḥ yo 'nividīrṇasukhaṃ puruṣo 'nubhūyate iti tātparyārthaḥ // 13.5
GS39purukadu:112: * śyāmayā saha nirveśane ratisukhodbodhanaṃ vīryastambhanaṃ kālāvadhiṃ ca proktam
GS39purukadu:113: upaśyāmayā saha krīḍane samupasthitau tatrāpi aireyasvīkaraṇasya atyāvaśyakatvenānuvidhānaṃ vidadhāti // 13.6]
GS39purukadu:114: upaśyāmayā saha vyānatādibandhe samupasthitau pāśina ātmajāyāḥ svīkaraṇe anirvacanīyasukhānubhave hetuḥ kāraṇatvam // 14 * [
GS39purukadu:116: * aprāptayauvanābhiḥ saha bāhyatantre manīṣāyāḥ samupasthitau aṇumātraṃ tasyai prāśayitavyaṃ
GS39purukadu:117: tāvanmātreṇaiva ubhayoḥ ānandasukhānulabdheḥ cumbanādivyāpāre anuvidhīyamāne alpasvīkāramātreṇa
GS39purukadu:119: * ātmajāyāḥ svīkaraṇam iti hetuvādaṃ manasi nidhāya auttarīyaṃ sūtram anuśāsti // 14.3]
GS39purukadu:122: * idānīm utkaṭayauvanāvasthāyām aireyaprāśanaṃ ratitantravilāse upadiśyate netarāvasthāyām
GS39purukadu:123: upayogābhāvād anadhikāritvād ity ālocya dvitīyāvasthāyām atyāvaśyakatvam iti paurastyasūtreṇānudarśayati // 16.1]
GS39purukadu:124: tīyapratyayasya prakṛtibhūtāyām avasthāyāṃ kaśyasvīkaraṇasyātyāvaśyakatvaṃ sati pūrvarūpasaṃyoge // 17 * [
GS39purukadu:126: * tīyapratyayasya prakṛtibhūtāyām avasthāyāṃ dvitīyāyām avasthāyāṃ dves tīya ity
GS39purukadu:127: anena dviśabdāt tīyapratyaye sati dvitīyaśabdo niṣpadyate tasyām avasthāyāṃ kaśyasvīkaraṇasyātyāvaśyakatvam
GS39purukadu:128: sati pūrvarūpasaṃyoge tādṛgavasthāvatyāḥ yoṣāyāḥ saṃnidhāne satīti jñeyam // 17.2
GS39purukadu:129: * nanu dṛṣṭaprayojanam uddiśya svīkaraṇaṃ vidhīyate vā adṛṣṭaphalam uddiśya vā dṛṣṭaprayojanasyaivātrākāṅkṣitatvān
GS39purukadu:130: nādṛṣṭaprayojanam uddiśyeti dṛṣṭaprayojanaṃ tu udañjidārḍhyapūrvarūpasya dṛṣṭaprayojanaṃ
GS39purukadu:131: tu āsyorojādyavayaveṣu usrādhikyasyātyādhikyatvena saṃdarśanam etasya phalatritayasyānubhavārthaṃ
GS39purukadu:132: dvitīyāvasthāvatā puruṣeṇa yoṣayā saha atyāvaśyakatvena sīdhugrahaṇaṃ rativilāsakāle
GS39purukadu:134: * saṃprasāraṇaviśiṣṭatīyapratyayasya prakṛtibhūtāyām avasthāyāṃ tu nātyāvaśyakam ity āha // 17.4]
GS39purukadu:137: * diṣṭakanyayā vyāptāyām avasthāyām urojandhayāyām avasthāyāṃ ca tasya prāśane nādhikārikatvam iti // 18.2
GS39purukadu:141: * ekatra paugaṇḍavayasaḥ puruṣakalpasya uttarasmin kāle upaśyāmayā samīkṛte anehasi andhasaḥ rasasya retasaḥ paripakvatāyāḥ abhāvāt tādṛkkarmādhikāre nādhikāritā // 19.2]
GS39purukadu:144: * jīrṇāvasthāyām api tadānīṃ diṣṭakanyayā saha atinarmavyavasāyena sarvāsām indriyavṛttānāṃ svakīyapravṛttau kṣīṇataratvasya dṛśyamānatvān nādhikārakatvam
GS39purukadu:145: * bālasya tathā jarāvataḥ puruṣasya ubhayoḥ narmakarmādhikāre nādhikāriteti sūtradvayasya tātparyārthaḥ // 20.3
GS39purukadu:146: * kāraṇarūpopādhau satyāṃ kāryarūpasyopādheḥ anudarśanam iti nyāyena padmāyāḥ anugraheṇa
GS39purukadu:147: paripūritānāṃ sārvabhaumādīnām eva anayā puṣpadhanuṣaḥ saraṇyā anuvartanaṃ sārvakālikaṃ
GS39purukadu:148: nityakarmādhikāravat yuktataraṃ nānyeṣām iti prakaraṇopasaṃhāram anudarśayati // 20.4]
GS39purukadu:151: * nanu ekatra vidhāne niṣedhavākyaṃ kutra vidhīyate ity uktaṃ cet pūrvoktajanapratiyogikeṣu pravartate ity āśayenāha // 21.2]
GS39purukadu:155: * nanu atyāvaśyakatvena īdṛkkarmavidhānaṃ kutrābhivyāptam iti cet tat sthānaṃ saṃpradarśayati // 22.3]
GS39purukadu:156: pāriśeṣyāj jaladhisambhavayā yukteṣv etac chāstrasya pravṛttiḥ // 23 * [
GS39purukadu:158: * pariśeṣasya bhāvaḥ pāriśeṣyaṃ tasmāt niṣedhavyāptyā rahitāt pārāvāratanūjayā saṃyukteṣv
GS39purukadu:159: eva kāpi śāyanasvīkaraṇaśāstrasya pravṛttiḥ anirvacanīyānandabodhāya pravartata ity arthaḥ // 23.2
GS39purukadu:163: * gotrāyāḥ apatyaṃ tasya ghasraṃ dinaṃ tasmin dine anutarṣasvīkaraṇam iti mṛkaṇḍatanūjasya matam // 24.2
GS39purukadu:167: * śukro daityaguruḥ kāvya iti kośābhidhānāt ghasro dināhanī vā tv ity amaraḥ // 25.2
GS39purukadu:173: * śaktyupāsanāvatām evāyaṃ niyamaḥ yat ghasradvaye 'py anuvartanaṃ taditareṣāṃ janānāṃ
GS39purukadu:174: pralambaghnamatānuyāyināṃ tu yathākālopadeśa iti na ghasradvaye parisaṃkhyānam ity arthaḥ // 27.2
GS39purukadu:178: * kṣatrajātau dvitīyavarṇe kāpiśāyanasvīkaraṇavidhānaṃ sārvakālikaṃ tāmasīprakṛteḥ upāsanādhikāravatāṃ nirantaraṃ kādambarasvīkaraṇaṃ kartavyatvenābhimatam
GS39purukadu:179: * aparokṣānubhavena tatsvarūpānudarśane upādānakāraṇatvāt ātmabhuvaḥ tanoḥ upāsanādhikāravat na ghasrayoḥ anuvartanam // 28.3
GS39purukadu:183: * vājapeye surāgrahān gṛhṇāti sautrāmaṇyāṃ surāgrahān gṛhṇātīti vākyadvayena prathamavarṇikasya yathāvācanikam eva grahaṇaprāśaneṣu ādhikāriko vidhiḥ // 29.2
GS39purukadu:184: * tathā cāyam arthaḥ vājapeye tu grahaṇamātrasyaivābhyanujñānaṃ prāśanābhyanujñānaṃ tu tṛtīyavarṇasyaiva tathā cānuśravikavākyaṃ vimāthaṃ kurvate vājasṛta iti // 29.3
GS39purukadu:185: * sautrāmaṇyāṃ tu yāgakartur eva prāśanaṃ nigamavākyenābhidhīyate netareṣām ṛtvijām tatrāpy āghrāṇenaiva prāśanapratipattir iti matāntaram iti ṛṣyantarāṇāṃ vacanam iti // 29.4
GS39purukadu:186: * sārvakālikābhyanujñānaṃ tu rasādhipatīnām eva nānyeṣāṃ janānām iti prakaraṇārtham upasaṃharati // 29.5]
GS39purukadu:187: khaṇḍamaṇḍalādhipatyādīnām indirāvatāṃ janānām api sīdhugrahaṇasya vilāsaḥ sārvakālikaḥ // 30 * [
GS39purukadu:189: * alpaviṣayasya śāsanakartṇāṃ rājñāṃ lokamātur anugraheṇa paripūritānāṃ sīdhugrahaṇena
GS39purukadu:190: vilāsānubhavaḥ vilāsānām anubhavanaṃ sārvakālikam na surathavaiśyādīnāṃ matam anusṛtya
GS39purukadu:195: * nidhuvanakāle eva svapatibhiḥ sārdhaṃ kādambarasvīkaraṇasyābhyanujñānaṃ netarāvasthāyāṃ kutaḥ upayogābhāvāt niṣphalaprayāse svīkaraṇasya vaiyarthyāpatteḥ
GS39purukadu:199: * ananyajena kriyamāṇeṣu makheṣv eva atyāvaśyakatvena anutarṣasvīkaraṇavidhānaṃ netaratra tadatiriktakāleṣv iti // 32.2
GS39purukadu:200: * yoṣāyāḥ atra yoṣāsaṃgraheṇa upaśyāmādīnām eva saṃgrahaḥ na vibhraṃśitadvitīyāvasthānām
GS39purukadu:201: āsyapadmena prāśanaṃ tu atyutkṛṣṭaphalaviśeṣāntaraṃ niścitya atyāvaśyakatvena prāśanam
GS39purukadu:203: yoṣāyāḥ āsyapadmena prāśanaṃ bhāṣāyāḥ prabodhe avyabhicaritakāraṇam // 33 * [
GS39purukadu:205: * yoṣāyāḥ āsyapadmena prāśane kriyamāṇe yathecchikī bhāṣāyāḥ anusphurtir bhavatīty arthaḥ // 33.2
GS39purukadu:206: * anena vākyena śravaṇādivyavasāyarahite 'pi jane niṣprayāsenaiva tridaśānāṃ gīḥ svamukhāt prādurbhūyata ity arthaḥ // 33.3
GS39purukadu:207: * anyad apy utkṛṣṭataraṃ phalaviśeṣāntaraṃ svīkāramātreṇa saṃpradarśayati // 33.4]
GS39purukadu:208: śyāmāyā āsyasahasrapattrād anuprāśanam aparokṣānubhavena mūlaprakṛteḥ svarūpasyānudarśanam // 34 * [
GS39purukadu:210: * śyāmāyāḥ kamalaprasūnāt anuprāśanaṃ pratyakṣānubhavena sākṣāt mūlaprakṛteḥ svarūpānudarśane
GS39purukadu:211: hetuḥ kāraṇam iti tayā saha saṃprāśane kriyamāṇe kṛtsnasya prapañcasya kāraṇabhūtāyāḥ
GS39purukadu:213: * yad vā tatsvarūpaṃ sākṣād avyavadhānena paśyatīty arthaḥ // 34.3
GS39purukadu:214: * anena vākyena sāyujyādikaṃ phalam api nirāyāsena prāpnotīty arthaḥ // 34.4
GS39purukadu:217: * tat sarvaṃ tu prakartavyaṃ yoṣāyāḥ sukhalabdhaye // 34.7
GS39purukadu:219: * phaladvayaṃ sa prāpnoti prajāṃ kāmasukhaṃ tathā // 34.9
GS39purukadu:220: * urvaśīlokam āpnoti antakāle tu saḥ pumān // 34.10
GS39purukadu:221: * iti śrīmahārājarṣivaryeṇa purūravasā viracitaṃ kāmijanānāṃ vinodāya rativilāsāṅgabhūtaṃ kādambarasvīkaraṇasūtraṃ savyākhyānaṃ samāptim agamat
